worker-has-eligible-docs.required: Tell us if the worker has any of the listed documents or evidence

start-work-date.required: Tell us when the worker started working for you
start-work-date.date: Enter a real worker start date
start-work-date.after: Enter a real date when the worker started working for you
start-work-date.before: The worker start date must be today or in the past

use-digital-right-to-work.required: Tell us if you are unable to use a digital Right to Work service

person-work-for-you.required: Tell us if the worker already works for you

worker-applied-eu-settlement-scheme.required: Tell us if the worker has applied to the EU Settlement Scheme (EUSS)

worker-has-arc-card.required: Tell us if the worker has an application registration card (ARC) that shows they have the right to work

work-for-you-result-of-tupe-transfer.required: Tell us if the worker works for you as a result of a TUPE transfer

tupe-date.required: Tell us when the worker works for you as a result of a TUPE transfer
tupe-date.date: Enter a real TUPE transfer date
tupe-date.after: TUPE transfer date must be after ({{diff}}) the worker started working for you
tupe-date.before: TUPE transfer date must be today or in the past

seen-original-document.required: Tell us if the you have seen the worker's original document

arc-number.notUrl: Your answer must not contain URLs or links
arc-number.alphanum: ARC number can only have numbers and letters a-z
arc-number.maxlength: Application registration card number must be 20 characters or less

worker-have-ongoing-appeal.required: Tell us if the worker has an ongoing application or appeal for permission to stay in the UK

worker-been-in-UK-before-1988.required: Tell us if the worker has been in the UK since before 1988

worker-applied-for-settlement-protection.required: Tell us if the worker has any evidence from or ongoing applications with the Home Office

worker-full-name.notUrl: Your answer must not contain URLs or links
worker-full-name.maxlength: Worker's full name must be 250 characters or less

worker-dob.required: Enter the worker's date of birth
worker-dob.before: The worker must be 16 years or older – this service only applies to workers aged 16 or over
worker-dob.after: Enter a real date of birth
worker-dob.date: Enter a real date of birth

worker-nationality.excludeUkIr: You do not need to request a Home Office right to work check if the worker is a UK or Republic of Ireland citizen

worker-reference-number.required: Enter a Home Office reference number
worker-reference-number.notUrl: Your answer must not contain URLs or links
worker-reference-number.maxlength: Home Office reference number must be between 2 and 250 characters
worker-reference-number.minlength: Home Office reference number must be between 2 and 250 characters

job-title.required: Enter the job title of the role
job-title.notUrl: Your answer must not contain URLs or links
job-title.minlength: Job title must be between 2 and 250 characters
job-title.maxlength: Job title must be between 2 and 250 characters

hours-of-work-per-week.required: Tell us how many hours per week the job involves
hours-of-work-per-week.min: Hours of work per week must be between 1 and 99
hours-of-work-per-week.max: Hours of work per week must be between 1 and 99

business-name.notUrl: Your answer must not contain URLs or links
business-name.minlength: Business name must be between 3 and 256 characters
business-name.maxlength: Business name must be between 3 and 256 characters

type-of-business.notUrl: Your answer must not contain URLs or links
type-of-business.minlength: Type of business must be between 3 and 256 characters
type-of-business.maxlength: Type of business must be between 3 and 256 characters

employers-contact-name.required: Enter a name of a contact from the employer
employers-contact-name.notUrl: Your answer must not contain URLs or links
employers-contact-name.minlength: Contact name must be between 3 and 256 characters
employers-contact-name.maxlength: Contact name must be between 3 and 256 characters

contact-job-title.required: Enter the job title of the employer contact
contact-job-title.notUrl: Your answer must not contain URLs or links
contact-job-title.minlength: Contact job title must be between 3 and 256 characters
contact-job-title.maxlength: Contact job title must be between 3 and 256 characters

contact-telephone.notUrl: Your answer must not contain URLs or links
contact-telephone.internationalPhoneNumber: Enter a telephone number, like 01632 960 001, 07700 900 982 or +44 808 157 0192

contact-email-address.required: Enter a contact email address from the employer
contact-email-address.minlength: Contact email address must be between 6 and 256 characters
contact-email-address.maxlength: Contact email address must be between 6 and 256 characters

business-address-line-1.required: Enter address line 1, typically the building and street
business-address-line-1.notUrl: Your answer must not contain URLs or links
business-address-line-1.maxlength: Address line 1 must be between 1 and 250 characters

business-address-line-2.notUrl: Your answer must not contain URLs or links
business-address-line-2.maxlength: Address line 2 must be between 1 and 250 characters

business-town-city.notUrl: Your answer must not contain URLs or links
business-town-city.maxlength: Town or city must be between 1 and 250 characters

before-1988-worker-full-name.notUrl: Your answer must not contain URLs or links
before-1988-worker-full-name.maxlength: Worker's full name must be 250 characters or less

before-1988-worker-dob.required: Enter the worker's date of birth
before-1988-worker-dob.date: Enter a real date of birth
before-1988-worker-dob.before: The worker must be 16 years or over – this service only applies to workers aged 16 or over
before-1988-worker-dob.after: Enter a real date of birth
before-1988-worker-dob.afterDobYear: Worker's date of birth must be before 1988, when they came to the UK

before-1988-worker-nationality.excludeUkIr: You do not need to request a Home Office right to work check if the worker is a UK or Republic of Ireland citizen

before-1988-worker-place-of-birth.required: Tell us where the worker was born
before-1988-worker-place-of-birth.notUrl: Your answer must not contain URLs or links
before-1988-worker-place-of-birth.maxlength: Worker's place of birth must be 250 characters or less

before-1988-worker-year-of-entry-to-uk.required: Tell us the year when the worker first came to the UK before 1988
before-1988-worker-year-of-entry-to-uk.maxlength: Year of entry to UK must be 4 characters
before-1988-worker-year-of-entry-to-uk.after120Years: Enter a real date of entry
before-1988-worker-year-of-entry-to-uk.after1988Years: You told us the worker arrived in the UK before 1988 – worker's year of entry must be before 1988
before-1988-worker-year-of-entry-to-uk.beforeDateOfBirth: Worker's year of entry must be after {{beforeDateOfBirth}} when they were born

before-1988-worker-national-insurance-nu.notUrl: Your answer must not contain URLs or links
before-1988-worker-national-insurance-nu.niNumber: Enter a National Insurance number in the correct format

before-1988-employer-telephone.notUrl: Your answer must not contain URLs or links
before-1988-employer-telephone.ukPhoneNumber: Enter a valid UK telephone number

worker-address-line-1.required: Enter address line 1, typically the building and street
worker-address-line-1.maxlength: Address line 1 must be between 1 and 250 characters
worker-address-line-1.notUrl: Your answer must not contain URLs or links

worker-address-line-2.notUrl: Your answer must not contain URLs or links
worker-address-line-2.maxlength: Address line 2 must be between 1 and 250 characters

worker-town-or-city.maxlength: Town or city must be between 1 and 250 characters
worker-town-or-city.notUrl: Your answer must not contain URLs or links

worker-zipcode.notUrl: Your answer must not contain URLs or links
worker-zipcode.maxlength: Postal code or ZIP code must be 10 characters or less
worker-zipcode.zipCode: Postal or ZIP code must only include letters a-z, numbers, spaces and dashes

worker-country.required: Enter the country the worker's address is in
worker-country.maxlength: Country must be between 1 and 250 characters

worker-uk-address-line-1.required: Enter address line 1, typically the building and street
worker-uk-address-line-1.maxlength: Address line 1 must be between 1 and 250 characters
worker-uk-address-line-1.notUrl: Your answer must not contain URLs or links

worker-uk-address-line-2.notUrl: Your answer must not contain URLs or links
worker-uk-address-line-2.maxlength: Address line 2 must be between 1 and 250 characters

worker-uk-town-or-city.maxlength: Town or city must be between 1 and 250 characters
worker-uk-town-or-city.notUrl: Your answer must not contain URLs or links

worker-uk-postcode.notUrl: Your answer must not contain URLs or links

privacy-check.required: Confirm you have read the Data Protection statement
